original_text: And the priest shall put on his linen garment, and his linen breeches shall he put upon his flesh, and take up the ashes which the fire hath consumed with the burnt offering on the altar, and he shall put them beside the altar.
korean_text: 제사장은 세마포 긴 옷을 입고 세마포 속바지로 하체를 가리고 제단 위에서 불태운 번제의 재를 가져다가 제단 곁에 두고

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall put on his linen garment
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 자신의 린넨 옷을 입을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and his linen breeches shall he put upon his flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 자신의 린넨 속바지를 몸에 입을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and take up the ashes which the fire hath consumed
with the burnt offering on the altar
and he shall put them beside the altar
